channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers caller questions about biblical history as literal or figurative, the presence of apostles at the Last Supper, and a marriage convalidation works in the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Solemnity Of The Feast Of Sts. Peter And Paul
channel.desc: From St. Peter?s Basilica (Altar of the Chair), and presided over by the Holy Father on the Solemnity of Saints Peter and Paul. Holy Mass and blessing of the Pallia for the new Metropolitan Archbishops. (105 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Center At Nyu: An Icon Of The New Evangelization
channel.desc: A documentary on the Dominican-run center at New York University, which provides the spiritual and intellectual formation of 18,000 Catholic students. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Six Paths To The Priesthood
channel.desc: Learn about the different ways Jesus Christ drew each man to the priesthood in this deeply personal account of six Dominican friars ordained by Bishop Robert Barron, who reflects upon his own experiences as well. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Financial specialist David Bahnsen explains how we discover meaning and purpose in work, and why a successful life is rooted in productivity and cultivation of God?s created world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: How to integrate Christian love into your leadership lives; putting principle and the common good before personal interests. (30 minutes).
